knimeNode.name: Variable to Table Row
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts variables and puts them into a single row table.

fullDescription.intro: Extracts scope variables and puts them into a single row table.
fullDescription.option: Include list contains all variables that are converted into a column of the resulting row, excluded variables are not used. All variables remain on the variable stack. Enforce exclusion and inclusion options can be used to force all new variables to be included or excluded, resp.
The name of the RowID used for the resulting row.
